title: Balsam Brands - True omnichannel achieved
description: Gladly isn’t just an omnichannel platform—it’s the gateway to all of our customer interactions. It seamlessly weaves together voice calls, emails, chats, SMS, and WhatsApp messages into a unified, continuous conversation with each customer. As magical as that may sound, the real secret sauce behind Gladly’s success is its exceptional support and product teams. They genuinely listen to their customers and work tirelessly to continually innovate and improve the platform." - Joe B. Tools Admin Seni

title: Breeze Airways - Customer testimonial
description: Gladly is well laid out and gives us the opportunity to understand our guests as a whole... Gladly remains one of the easiest tools for our Breeze team to learn." - Danny Cox, Vice President of Guest Experience

title: Breeze Airways - Reduced agent attrition
description: One of the major successes we've seen is that we have a significantly lower attrition rate compared to a traditional call center. Our agents experience a much higher quality of interactions, which makes their work more satisfying.

title: Breeze Airways - Customer testimonial
description: The evolution of Gladly has allowed us to provide options to Guests much more quickly than any other airline. With digital communication and features like Answer Threads, when Guests need to modify or cancel their flights, we can present their options faster than traditional methods." Danny Cox, Vice President of Guest Experience

title: Breeze Airways - Customer testimonial
description: I totally understand why some might see multi-channel communication as adding complexity. However, we've found the opposite to be true. It has actually helped us with compliance because every interaction is documented in a transcript, allowing us to track everything said on both sides." Danny Cox, Vice President of Guest Experience

title: Breeze Airways - Customer testimonial
description: Having guest attributes allows us to prioritize conversations based on urgency... By ingesting this data into Gladly, we can prioritize urgent requests. We love this feature because it allows us to serve our Guests more efficiently and effectively." - Danny Cox, Vice President of Guest Experience

title: KUHL - Easy training and adoption
description: The implementation process was remarkably smooth. We didn't need multiple training sessions because the platform is so intuitive. The Gladly team understood our unique needs and helped us build out the system to match both KÜHL's requirements and our team's workflow.

title: KUHL - Customer testimonial
description: It's been incredible to see the natural evolution of our customer interactions. Now that we've moved beyond just processing transactions, our team can share their genuine enthusiasm for our products, which creates a more engaging experience for everyone involved.

title: KUHL - Cost savings achieved
description: The time savings we've achieved have enabled us to support other departments, giving our team opportunities to learn about different aspects of the business and see customer service from new perspectives.

title: KUHL - Customer testimonial
description: Previously, our team was so focused on reducing ticket numbers that they couldn't properly engage with customers about our products. Now I hear them confidently making recommendations—when someone calls about pants, they naturally transition to discussing our Renegade shirts and other complementary items.

title: KUHL - AI implementation success
description: The AI handles routine inquiries, giving our team more time to focus on meaningful customer conversations.

title: KUHL - Customer testimonial
description: With our previous ticket based system, you had to start fresh every single time, and it was frustrating for customers. My team couldn't make any connections because the system wouldn't link anything together.

title: KUHL - AI implementation success
description: Since implementing Sidekick, I've been amazed to see our brand's tone coming through so authentically in the AI responses. It truly represents who we are.

title: KUHL - AI implementation success
description: Our IT manager recently attended an AI conference, and afterward he told me, 'We need to talk.' When I asked what was wrong, he said, 'We're doing it right. We got it right with Gladly.' That was incredibly validating.

title: KUHL - AI implementation success
description: We implemented Sidekick to handle initial responses, and if an issue requires more attention, it transitions seamlessly to an agent. Our customers don't even realize they're interacting with AI—it's that natural.

title: KUHL - Customer testimonial
description: Unlike our previous system where we had to purchase additional apps for basic functionality, Gladly provided everything we needed out of the box. We immediately had access to real-time data and seamless channel integration—it just worked.

title: Rothy's - Customer testimonial
description: We're fully integrated with Shopify and Loop, so my agents do not have to leave Gladly to do some pretty basic functions and lookups. For a lot of our inbounds, they're able to stay in Gladly and use that as the primary tool.

title: Rothy's - AI implementation success
description: I always said one of my goals was to never let agents go because of AI. But I'm finding I don't have to staff for peak anymore - I'm just hiring for attrition. I have 5 agents that want to return to college and do part-time - before implementing AI, I could never do it.” Lauren Inman-Semerau, Head of Customer Experience, Rothy’s

title: Rothy's - Easy training and adoption
description: It's really impactful that we can have all channels inbound into the same conversation timeline. As you grow your business strategy, Gladly makes it very easy without losing a lot of data and customer insight and that personalization.

title: Rothy's - AI implementation success
description: We leverage AI to take the burden off our agents and their workloads. Sidekick allows our agents to focus on more complex, nuanced conversations or those that have more selling opportunities such as fit, sizing, and style and really connect with customers.

title: Rothy's - AI implementation success
description: We are finding that there is a high conversion rate to purchase if you have spoken with my agents, particularly on chat. As the AI bot is taking away the 'clutter,' it's allowing us to get to the meat and potatoes of what e-commerce is all about.

title: Rothy's - Easy training and adoption
description: What we have found is that it's a relatively quick ramp-up to train on Gladly's actual tool and system. Within a short timeframe, they are fully functioning. By the time agents complete the first week of training, Gladly's the tool they're the most comfortable with.

title: Rothy's - Customer testimonial
description: It's like Apple—you can pick up your iPhone, turn it on, and figure it out. There's an ease level that Gladly has built in that allows me to do my job and pivot very quickly and efficiently.

title: Rothy's - Cost savings achieved
description: One of the most interesting cost savings benefits has been in how I hire for peak. For the first time, we have just hired to gap attrition because the actual number of conversations that agents are having to handle has lowered.
